Name: Yokai Mask
About the game: Story Qiu Yue, the girl who has lost her childhood memories, wants to find out the truth by the only clue -- a fox mask. But she is trapped in a 50-years conspiracy when searching an old mask shop. All the truth is going to show by the adventure of Qiu Yue and two mates ... Introduction is a 2D horror puzzle game made by RPG Maker Vx Ace. The game contains adventure and puzzle mainly, and some chasing gameplay. The game will takes player more than 2 hours to play through to reach one of those 2 endings: including 'normal ending' and 'true ending'. Which ending player reaching will be decided by the completion of key items. Strengths Original characters & story Different puzzles designed to play with those masks Beautiful original musics More contents being planned...
